casebody.data:
MAX KURZROK, Inc., v. DEBENHAM, GARDINER & CO., Limited. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 6, 1923.) No. 181. *1022McLaughlin & Stern, of New York City (Martin Lippman, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Abraham AUenberg, of New York City (George Edwin Joseph, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYEE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
